item.title: CVE-2020-1712|2024-08-04T06:46:30.849Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- systemd
item.description: A heap use-after-free vulnerability was found in systemd before version v245-rc1, where asynchronous Polkit queries are performed while handling dbus messages. A local unprivileged attacker can abuse this flaw to crash systemd services or potentially execute code and elevate their privileges, by sending specially crafted dbus messages.
